basics.name: Ethan C Wiggins
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm from North Louisiana. I graduated from the University of Louisiana at Monroe with a BS degree in Computer Science in 2013. In 2012, I took an internship at the Centurylink Headquarters in Monroe, LA focusing on Java API and Web Service developement. In 2014, I got the oppurtunity to move to Shreveport,LA working as a full stack .NET developer for Praeses, LLC. My work mainly consists of C# MVC development, the Knockout library, Web API 2.0, and SQL Server development.

work.summary: Praeses is a leader in software development and services, offering proven and consistent business solutions to customers in both the public and private sectors. With over two decades of IT experience, Praeses serves as an independent, trusted advisor helping clients re-engineer processes and leverage emerging technologies to optimize operations.
highlights: Migrate legacy code for the company, from VB6 and classic ASP to C# MVC
Knockout development utilizing the MVVM pattern
SQL development leveraging SQL Server 2008 and later

work.summary: Centurylink is a leading provider of Internet, TV, and Voice services. Centurylink is a S&P 500 Company and is include on the Fortune 500 list of America's largest corporations.
highlights: Maintain and add new functionality leveraging the Java Spring MVC framework
Java RESTful Web Services leveraging the Java EE 6 API
Javascript and jQuery front end development
SQL development using PL/SQL for Oracle databases

Professional Associations and Activities.name: Member
keywords: Louisiana Delta Chapter of Kappa Mu Epsilon at ULM, Monroe, LA
Louisiana Chapter of Upsilon Pi Epsilon at ULM, Monroe, LA
